solutions.descriptionText: I spent long nights sitting here reading and researching botany before I died...
No one has watered these plants in a long time... The lab must have been abandonned after the accident
These pesky plants always end up blocking my way when they haven't been watered
These rare plants produce a poisonous gas. When consumed in large quantities, it can be quite deadly...
For the study of plants to be both my reason to live and my cause of death. What a cruel irony. If only the glass hadn't broke... I could have continued my research.
